property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play Wolves of the North by 1 for each The North agenda you are running.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR. After attached character leaves play, you may attach Winter Cache to another character instead of placing it in your discard pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to choose 1 Night's Watch character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which attached character participated, you may choose to take 1 gold from the defending player or the treasury and add it to your gold pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Loyal Guard can be played from your hand as a duplicate on a N character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing. Westeros.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Seat of Power from play to reduce the cost of the next Baratheon card you play this phase by 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win initiative, discard the top 2 cards of each opponent's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If an opponent would win initiative, cancel the initiative count. You win initiative instead.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: 'Response: If an opponent would win initiative, cancel the determination of initiative winner. You win initiative instead.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Dothraki.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Power challenge in which Khal Drogo is participating, choose and kill 1 character with lower STR than Khal Drogo.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the N crest and a Power icon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Palace Spy from your hand, search your deck for 1 influence-providing location, reveal that card, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 2 influence to stand a participating character, and remove it from the current challenge. That character cannot be killed this phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: During Military challenges, Ranger of the Watch gains stealth.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Septon Cellador to shuffle any player's deck.

property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play a Night's Watch character from your hand, reduce the cost of the next Night's Watch character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Skinchanger gains an icon of your choice until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Wildling. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you lose a challenge in which Craster participated, the winning opponent draws 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wildling character only. Any Phase: Kneel Wildling Mead to stand attached character.

property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may run any number of The North agendas. You need 2 additional power to win the game.Night's Watch characters you control gain a Military icon.

property.value: Should read: '...You may run any number of The North agendas that have the words Night's Watch in their text.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, claim 1 power for your House. (Claim 2 power instead if it is Winter.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Benjen Stark comes into play, choose and stand 1 Night's Watch character or choose and kneel 1 Wildling character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stealth. No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Frozen Moat to choose 1 attacking character. Until the end of the challenge, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Lord Tywin's Man is attacking, lannister characters cannot defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the initiative value on each player's revealed plot card to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win dominance, kneel Zealot of the Light to discard 1 card at random from any 1 opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If an opponent would win dominance, cancel the dominance count. You automatically win dominance this phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: 'Response: If an opponent would win dominance, cancel the determination of dominance winner. You win dominance instead.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Nute the Barber +1 STR until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Iron Islands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which at least 1 N character participated, choose 1 of the following: claim 1 power for your House, add 2 gold from the treasury to your gold pool, or draw 1 card. (You may select each option once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character's STR is reduced to 0, draw 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character's STR is lowered by a card effect, kneel Meereenese Brothel to choose and discard an attachment from play.

property.value: Ally. Maester.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Maester of Lemonwood from your hand, choose and discard any number of Condition attachments from play.

property.value: Weapon. Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Martell character you control. Response: After an opponent plays an event card, kill attached character to cancel the effects of that event. Then, if it is Summer, draw a card.

property.value: Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stonesnake can declare stealth on characters with stealth.

property.value: Stealth. No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Night's Watch. Wildling.

property.name: Text
property.value: After Traitorous Crow comes out of Shadows, choose and discard 1 Night's Watch or 1 Wildling character from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard 1 Night's Watch character from play to search your deck for 1 different Night's Watch character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Wildling. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the challenge phase, return Mammoth Riders to your hand if it is still in play. After you play Mammoth Riders, you cannot play any further cards from your hand this round.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play a Wildling character from your hand, reduce the cost of the next Wildling you play this phase by 1.

property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wildling characters you control do not kneel to attack, and cannot defend.

property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may run any number of The North agendas. You need 2 additional power to win the game. Wildling characters you control gain stealth.

property.value: Should read: '...You may run any number of The North agendas that have the words Wilding in their text.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player cannot play or put into play more than 1 card from his or her hand until you reveal a new plot card.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Playing or putting a card into Shadows from your hand does count against the limitation set by Fear of Winter. Bringing a card out of Shadows does not count against this card's limitation. Replacement effects that put a card into play from a player's hand (such as those on PotS Darkstar and PotS House Dayne Reserves) also count against the limitation set by this card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Night's Watch. Wildling.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 Night's Watch or 1 Wildling character to choose another Night's Watch or Wildling character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a War crest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If an opponent would win a Military challenge against you, kneel 2 influence to cancel the determination of challenge winner. You automatically win the challenge.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Pay 2 gold to put Greedy Councilor into play from your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard X power from your House or from cards you control to take X gold from the treasury and add it to your gold pool.

property.value: House Lannister only.

property.value: Response: After you play Salladhor's Crew from your hand, reduce the gold cost of the next Baratheon card you play this phase by 3.

property.value: If you are the only player to control The Iron Throne, you automatically win dominance (cannot be canceled).

property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Margaery Tyrell to choose an opponent. That opponent must choose and reveal a new plot card. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: If you do not control at least 1 Greyjoy character, discard Naval Escort from play. Any Phase: Kneel X Warship locations to choose X characters. Until the end of the phase, those characters get +X STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: N characters you control cannot lose icons, have their STR reduced, or be knelt by card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 3 influence to choose 3 characters without any attachments. Until the end of the phase, one of those characters gets -1 STR, the second gets -2 STR, and the third gets -3 STR.

property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Dayne characters get +1 STR for each gold token on them. Response: After you win a challenge in which a House Dayne character participated, place 1 gold token from the treasury on that character.

property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Military challenge in which at least 1 Night's Watch character participated, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains renown. If attached character is Jon Snow, he also gets +2 STR. After attached character leaves play, you may attach Longclaw to a Night's Watch character instead of placing it in your discard pile.

property.value: While Orell the Eagle is attacking, opponents must declare at least 2 defenders in order to defend the challenge.

property.value: If you win an unopposed challenge in which Crow Killers participated, discard them from play.

property.value: Coldhands cannot be killed. Coldhands gains the benefit of any The North agenda being run (as if he had the Night's Watch and Wildling traits). Coldhands must participate in the first challenge initiated for which he is eligible each round.

property.value: Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the dominance phase, discard the top card of any deck. If that card does not have either a Night's Watch or The North trait, discard Lost Ranger from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Wildling. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Mance Rayder to choose 1 The North agenda or location. Until the end of the phase, treat that card as if its printed text box were blank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Reveal and draw the top card of your deck. Play that card as your next response or action, if able. Otherwise, discard it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Each player must discard the top X cards of his or her deck, where X is the number of characters in his or her dead pile. Then, the player who discarded the fewest cards draws a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may run any number of The North agendas. You need 2 additional power to win the game. Reduce the cost of the first Wildling character you play from your hand each round by 2.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: '...You may run any number of The North agendas that have the words Wilding in their text.' Should read: 'Reduce the cost of the first unique Wildling character you play from your hand each round by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win dominance this round, claim 3 additional power for your House.

property.value: House Stark only.
